name: At the Derby
description:
Disclaimer for jam judges: This game is nearly identical in design to https://toadheart.itch.io/domino-of-evidence , however, all of the underlying code has been rewritten, and there is a new story and art.

The theme used is "Protection Racket".


Something is fishy at the Derby, and it's not just the presence of a maid or Mister Planina's scandalous dress.  Combine clues to figure out the truth!
